meanings.sent1: He was hacksawing through the metal pipe.
meanings.sent2: She hacksawed the wooden plank in half.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel was hacksawing a nut open.
meanings.sent4: The chef hacksawed the frozen meat with precision.
meanings.sent5: The sound of hacksawing echoed through the workshop.

meanings.definition: The act of cutting with a hacksaw.
meanings.sent1: The hacksawing of the metal bar took time.
meanings.sent2: I heard the distinct sound of hacksawing coming from the garage.
meanings.sent3: The hacksawing competition at the fair was intense.
meanings.sent4: The hacksawing of the tree branch sounded like music to his ears.
meanings.sent5: The hacksawing left a clean cut on the pipe.
